org.daisy.dotify.formatter.impl.core

Class LayoutMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.dotify.formatter.impl.core.LayoutMaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.LayoutMasterBuilder, org.daisy.dotify.api.writer.SectionProperties, BorderManagerProperties

    public class LayoutMaster
extends Object
implements org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.LayoutMasterBuilder, org.daisy.dotify.api.writer.SectionProperties, BorderManagerProperties
    Specifies the layout of a paged media.
